title: This 1BR/1BA Home Is a Short Walk Away from Walt Disney Concert Hall!
posting_body: ['Museum Tower', 'Address:', '225 South Olive Street Los Angeles, CA 90012', 'Whitney-4R  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 792 Sq.', 'Ft / $2,700 - $2,930', '* Unit 1706 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 807 - Available Now * Unit 1307 - Available 8/13/22', '* Unit 606 - Available 9/1/22', 'Welcome to Museum Tower Apartments in Los Angeles, CA.', "Downtown LA's most exciting community.", 'Museum Tower offers luxury high-rise rental apartments with sweeping views of Downtown Los Angeles and a wealth of upscale services and amenities.', 'It is ideally located just steps from the Museum of Contemporary Art, Walt Disney Concert Hall, the Ahmanson Theatre, Dorothy Chandler Pavilion, Grand Park and the Broad Museum, as well as exceptional fine dining and entertainment.', 'Our floor plans range in size from studios to two bedroom apartments and boast tasteful amenities and functional features.', 'Our property includes a fitness center, an outdoor heated pool, a social room and a 24-hour attended lobby.', 'An exciting multi-million dollar interior remodel has begun and will provide our residents with additional cutting edge amenities and a higher standard of living.', "Escape
